meanings.definition: Involving or representing different religious denominations.
meanings.sent1: The interdenominational event welcomed people from all faiths.
meanings.sent2: The interdenominational choir sang songs from different religions.
meanings.sent3: The interdenominational potluck had a mix of delicious dishes from various churches.
meanings.sent4: Her interdenominational necklace symbolized unity among different beliefs.
meanings.sent5: The interdenominational gathering promoted harmony among diverse religious groups.

meanings.definition: A service or organization that includes members from various denominations.
meanings.sent1: The interdenominational service on Sunday was attended by people from different churches.
meanings.sent2: She volunteered at the interdenominational organization to help those in need.
meanings.sent3: The interdenominational picnic brought together members of different faiths for a day of fun.
meanings.sent4: The interdenominational committee worked together to plan the upcoming event.
meanings.sent5: Attending the interdenominational meeting allowed her to learn about other religious practices.
